mapper.insert: insert into manager_report (mrid, mid, name, start_date, end_date, orders_placed, orders_delivered, orders_open, orders_cancelled, total_revenue, total_products__revenue, total_delivery_revenue, lf2u_management_fee, total_lf2u_fees, total_payable_to_farm, by_farmer) values (#{mrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordersPlaced,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordersDelivered,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordersOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordersCancelled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalProductsRevenue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalDeliveryRevenue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lf2uManagementFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalLf2uFees,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalPayableToFarm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byFarmer,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update manager_report set mid = #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orders_placed = #{ordersPlaced,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orders_delivered = #{ordersDelivered,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orders_open = #{ordersOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orders_cancelled = #{ordersCancelled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_revenue = #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_products__revenue = #{totalProductsRevenue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_delivery_revenue = #{totalDeliveryRevenue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lf2u_management_fee = #{lf2uManagementFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_lf2u_fees = #{totalLf2uFees,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_payable_to_farm = #{totalPayableToFarm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, by_farmer = #{byFarmer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mrid = #{mrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mrid, mid, name, start_date, end_date, orders_placed, orders_delivered, orders_open, orders_cancelled, total_revenue, total_products__revenue, total_delivery_revenue, lf2u_management_fee, total_lf2u_fees, total_payable_to_farm, by_farmer from manager_report where mrid = #{mrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mrid, mid, name, start_date, end_date, orders_placed, orders_delivered, orders_open, orders_cancelled, total_revenue, total_products__revenue, total_delivery_revenue, lf2u_management_fee, total_lf2u_fees, total_payable_to_farm, by_farmer from manager_report

select mrid, mid, name, start_date, end_date, orders_placed, orders_delivered, orders_open, orders_cancelled, total_revenue, total_products__revenue, total_delivery_revenue, lf2u_management_fee, total_lf2u_fees, total_payable_to_farm, by_farmer from manager_report WHERE mrid = #{0}
